issue.title: lazy_split_view::outer-iterator's const-converting constructor isn't setting trailing_empty_

discussion.p: It seems the const-converting constructor for lazy_split_view's iterator fails to propagate trailing_empty_ from the argument, which effectively results in the trailing empty range getting skipped over:

blockquote.pre: constexpr outer-iterator(outer-iterator<!Const> i) requires Const && convertible_to<iterator_t<V>, iterator_t<Base>>;

blockquote.p: -4- Effects: Initializes parent_ with i.parent_, and current_ with std::move(i.current_), and trailing_empty_ with i.trailing_empty_.
